articles.content: Almost exactly a year ago, I reviewed the original Surface Pro X saying that it's the perfect portable PC (for me). It was my favorite PC of 2019, and thanks to a minor refresh, it's my favorite PC o… [+15173 chars]

articles.title: Sony's WH-1000XM4 headphones drop to $278 in early Black Friday sale - Engadget
articles.description: Sony's high-quality WH-1000XM4 wireless headphones have dropped to a $278 price in an early Black Friday sale.
articles.content: The WH-1000XM4 is our top-rated set of wireless headphones, and for good reason. It offers deep bass without sacrificing detail, and the strong active noise cancellation can help you attain that much… [+669 chars]
